analysis.description:
BacchusBlockchainCoin.startDate (/unique_chucks/33/0x4f8849c425881fa6f7b4fcae0a367053ce3230b7.sol#101-102) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x4f8849c425881fa6f7b4fcae0a367053ce3230b7.sol#212-224)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x4f8849c425881fa6f7b4fcae0a367053ce3230b7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x4f8849c425881fa6f7b4fcae0a367053ce3230b7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x4f8849c425881fa6f7b4fcae0a367053ce3230b7.sol#79) is not in mixedCase
